Contributor: Morgan, R. G., artist.; Victory Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "R.G. Morgan." Date based on date of Victory Liberty Loan Campaign. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text tells how this Victory Liberty Loan is the most important of all the loans because now that the war is won the bills must be paid: "Uncle Sam's debt is your debt." Illustration shows Uncle Sam holding a Victory Liberty Loan bond in his hand as he says "I always pay my debts!"  This is a design for a newspaper advertisement.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: "I always pay my debts!"
